ce.com>
CC: Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; UAE Leasing <uaeleasing@chalhoub.com>; Kevin Chalhoub <Kevin.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Arbi Triki <Arbi.Triki@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-21 16:29
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION (RE-OPENING) | TUMI Boutique at Dubai Mall
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Thank you for your time today!

 

Kindly note that and as confirmed by the business team today below is the new handover date:

 

the boutique handover from contractor team is on Monday 25th Nov, and the opening date is on Wednesday 27th Nov 2024 (Tumi Pop Up will remain operating till the end of December 2024) and below is the agreed tasks with all stake holders:

 

@Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  start normal cleaning from 25th Nov & Pest control once permit is received , making sure the Tumi Pop Up services will remain till the end of December 24.

@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  The Tumi Pop Up Xstore set up to be completed and installed on 25th Nov , 23rd & completing all the opening requirements for Tumi Boutique with connectivity & Hardware installations (POS/BOH & Traffic counter).

@Hussain ALHUSSAIN <mailto:Hussain.Alhussain@chalhoub.com>  Ensure stock of Tumi pop up as sipped and received in the system on 24th Nov, all stock which will be displayed and sell in the boutique needs to be moved to boutique on Mon 25th Nov.

@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please confirm 2 CC machines been arranged for Tumi Boutique and will be delivered to the boutique on 25th Nov/ Arrange TG team service starting in the boutique from 27th Nov, and keep the service of Tumi pop up till 24th Dec.

@Tarek AL SHAYEB <mailto:Tarek.Alshayeb@chalhoub.com>  please provide all details for insurance to Hagop.

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  share the insurance certificates.

 

Tumi Dubai Mall Main Boutique : RMS code : 32022 & BU code: 10DT8

Tumi Pop Up : RMS code : 32036 & BU code: 10TPM

 

Thanks,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

DUBAI

chunks.text:
n.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com> >; Arbi Triki <Arbi.Triki@chalhoub.com <mailto:Arbi.Triki@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION (RE-OPENING) | TUMI Boutique at Dubai Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of “TUMI Boutique at Dubai Mall” .

 

the handover from contractor team is on Thursday 28th Nov, and the opening date is on Friday 29th Nov 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

chunks.text:
<mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com> >; UAE Leasing <uaeleasing@chalhoub.com <mailto:uaeleasing@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE Renovation | (Tumi - Dubai Mall ) 
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have Re- Opening of TUMI Boutique at Dubai Mall” The Last trading date on 28th Aug after and hoarding installation will be on 28th Aug after trading hours.

 

@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure the IT equipment is dismantled on August 29th before trading hours. The POS system will remain with you until the reopening of the TUMI boutique. We will provide an update regarding the TUMI pop once it is confirmed. Additionally, please move the BOH desktop to external storage to ensure continuity in fulfilment. Ensure that a power plug is available in the storage room.

 

@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  dismantling of the NVR from Tumi boutique on 29th Aug before trading hours.

 

@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please inform TG team to collect the cash from the boutique on 29th Aug and freeze their service until further notice.

 

Transfer the stock physically to external storage room on 29th Aug before trading hours @Hussain ALHUSSAIN <mailto:Hussain.Alhussain@chalhoub.com> @Tumi Dubai Mall <mailto:Tumi.DubaiMall@chalhoub.com> 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me 050-3859997.

Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑
